sentence.Network_en: Israel offers automatic citizenship to all Jews who want it.
sentence.Network_cn: 以色列为所有希望获得公民身份的犹太人敞开大门。

sentence.Network_en: In 1986, they got the right to reclaim South African citizenship.
sentence.Network_cn: 1986年，他们取得了恢复南非公民身份的权利。

sentence.Network_en: Their German peers had a more developed sense of citizenship.
sentence.Network_cn: 和他们同龄的德国人有着更强烈的公民归属感。

entry.def: If you have citizenship of a country, you are legally accepted as belonging to it.

example.ex: After 15 years in the USA, he has finally decided to apply for American citizenship...
example.tran: 在美国生活了15年之后，他终于决定申请美国国籍。

example.ex: Only people who can trace their family history in Kuwait back before 1920 are entitled to citizenship.
example.tran: 只有其在科威特的家族史可以追溯到1920年以前的人才能获国籍。

entry.tran: 公民归属；公民义务;公民责任感
entry.def: Citizenship is the fact of belonging to a community because you live in it, and the duties and responsibilities that this brings.

example.ex: Their German peers had a more developed sense of citizenship.
example.tran: 和他们同龄的德国人有着更强烈的公民归属感。

means.word_mean: 1. the status of a citizen with rights and duties

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词,表示"某种技能"; 2. 表名词,表示"某种关系,状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: airman飞行员,空军+ship某种技能→n.飞行术,导航技术
horseman养马的人,骑师,马兵+ship某种技能→n.马术

stems_affixes.value_cn: 推销术,说服力,销售,推销
stems_affixes.word_buile: salsman推销员+ship某种技能→n.推销术,说服力,销售,推销
champion冠军+ship某种关系,状态→n.锦标赛;冠军赛

stems_affixes.value_cn: 市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
stems_affixes.word_buile: citizen公民+ship某种关系,状态→n.市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
dictator专政者+ship某种关系,状态→n.独裁[权];专政
friend朋友+ship某种关系,状态→n.友谊,友好
hard艰难的+ship某种关系,状态→n.艰难,困苦
member成员+ship某种关系,状态→n.会员资格,成员资格
partner合作者+ship某种关系,状态→n.合伙企业
relation关系,联系+ship某种关系,状态→n.关系,联系

sentences.en: They stripped me of my citizenship and deported me.
sentences.cn: 他们剥夺我的公民资格,将我驱逐出境。

sentences.en: He was stripped of his citizenship when he criticized the government.
sentences.cn: 他由于批评政府而被剥夺了公民资格。

sentences.en: Husbands and wives of British nationals do not automatically gain citizenship.
sentences.cn: 英国公民的配偶不能自动取得公民身分。

sentences.en: He was born in Sweden, but he doesn’t have Swedish citizenship.
sentences.cn: 他在瑞典出生,但没有瑞典公民身分。

sentences.en: Ten years later, she chose to take Australian citizenship.
sentences.cn: 十年后，她选择了澳大利亚国籍。

sentences.en: Their citizenship in school is very good.
sentences.cn: 他们在学校的表现非常好。
